title: Eggs Benedict
ingredients: Hollandaise: 3 egg yolks, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 cup (2 sticks) butter, melted, pinch cayenne
steps: Make hollandaise: Blend yolks and lemon juice 5 seconds. With blender running, slowly drizzle in hot butter until thick. Season with salt and cayenne. Keep warm.
Heat Canadian bacon in skillet until browned.
Bring water to bare simmer. Add vinegar.
Crack eggs into small bowls. Swirl water, slip eggs in. Poach 3-4 minutes.
Remove eggs with slotted spoon, drain.
